<section class="product-detail">
    <div>

    <div class="details">
        <h1>Product Name</h1>
        <p class="blurb">Supports the immune health of a pregnant mother and developing baby*</p>

            <p>yotpo stuff</p>
        </div>

        <ul class="pricing">
            <li class="sales-price"><span>Sale Price:</span> $35.69</li>
            <li class="standard-price"><span>Regular Price:</span> $38.99</li>
        </ul>

        <!--

        	<div class="promotion-callout">

        	</div>
        </div>
    	-->

        <div class="og-offer">
            <p>OG stuff</p>
        </div>

        <h2 class="visually-hidden">Variations</h2>

<section class="product-detail">
	<div>
		{{> @product-slider}}
	</div>

	<div class="details">
		<h1>Product Name</h1>
		<p class="blurb">Supports the immune health of a pregnant mother and developing baby*</p>
		
		<div class="yotpo"><p>yotpo stuff</p></div>
		
		<ul class="pricing">
			<li class="sales-price"><span>Sale Price:</span> $35.69</li>
            <li class="standard-price"><span>Regular Price:</span> $38.99</li>
        </ul>

		<!--
        <h2 class="details-subheader">Promotions</h2>
        <div class="c-promotions">
        	<div class="promotion-callout">
        		<span class="callout-message">test_bonus_product</span>
        	</div>
        </div>
    	-->

		<div class="og-offer"><p>OG stuff</p></div>

		<h2 class="visually-hidden">Variations</h2>

		<h3 class="details-subheader">Size</h3>
		<ol class="variations">
			<li><div class="disabled">30</div></li>
			<li class="selected"><a href="#">60</a></li>
			<li><a href="#">90</a></li>
			<li><a href="#">180</a></li>
		</ol>
		<p class="serving-info">Servings per container: <span>30</span></p>

		<form action="" class="pdpForm">
			<div>
				<label for="quantity">Qty</label>
				<input type="number" name="quantity" id="quantity" min="1" max="99" step="1" value="1">
			</div>
			<div>
				<button type="submit">Add to Cart</button>
			</div>
		</form>

		<a href="#facts" class="facts">Learn Key Facts</a>

		{{> @bundled-products}}
	</div>
</section>
 
/* No context defined for this component. */
  • Content: 
    .product-detail {
    border-bottom: 1px solid $alabaster;

    .details {
        padding: 0 $gutter-sm px-to-rem(48px) $gutter-sm;
    }

    h1 {
        font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: px-to-rem(26px);
        color: $zuccini;
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(8px);
    }

    .blurb {
        font-size: px-to-rem(21px);
        line-height: 1.43;
        color: $black;
        max-width: px-to-rem(720px);//keeps text at good length for readability (80 chars per line)
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(8px);
    }

    .yotpo {
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(16px);
    }

    .pricing {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        align-items: center;
        list-style: none;
        margin-left: 0;
        font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
        color: $black;
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);

        li {
            margin-right: px-to-rem(16px);
        }

        span {
            @include hide();
        }
    }

    .sales-price {
        font-size: px-to-rem(26px);
        font-weight: 600;
    }

    .standard-price {
        font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
        text-decoration: line-through;
    }

    .og-offer {
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);
    }

    .details-subheader {
        font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;
        font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
        font-weight: 600;
        color: $black;
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(8px);
    }

    .variations {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        list-style: none;
        padding-left: 0;

        li {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: px-to-rem(100px);
            margin-right: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;

            > * {
                display: block;
                font-size: px-to-rem(21px);
                font-weight: 600;
                color: $mine-shaft;
                padding: px-to-rem(10.5px) px-to-rem(32px);
                text-align: center;
                border: 2px solid $dusty-gray;
                border-radius: px-to-rem(3px);
            }
        }
        
        a {
            &:hover, &:focus {
                border-color: $vidaLoca;
            }
        }

        .selected {
            a {
                color: $vidaLoca;
                border-color: $vidaLoca;
            }
        }

        .disabled {
            cursor: not-allowed;
            color: $gray;
            border-color: $alabaster-light;
            background-color: $alabaster-light;
        }
    }

    .serving-info {
        font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
        color: $black;
        margin-top: px-to-rem(-8px);
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);

        span {
            font-weight: 600;
        }
    }

    .pdpForm {
        input {
            max-width: px-to-rem(175px);
        }

        [type="submit"] {
            display: inline-block;
            font-size: px-to-rem(21px);
            font-weight: 600;
            text-align: center;
            padding: px-to-rem(16px) px-to-rem(40px);
            color: $white;
            background-color: $vidaLoca;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: px-to-rem(443px);
            border: none;
            border-radius: px-to-rem(3px);
            margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);//change to 16 when get facts link
            transition: all 0.3s ease;

            &:hover, &:focus {
                color: $white;
                background-color: $celtic;
                cursor: pointer;
            }

            &[disabled]{
                color: $white;
                background-color: $gray;

                &:hover, &:focus {
                    cursor: not-allowed;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    .facts {
        display: block;
        text-align: center;
        color: $vidaLoca;
        width: 100%;
        padding: px-to-rem(16px) px-to-rem(40px);
        max-width: px-to-rem(443px);
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);

        &:hover, &:focus {
            text-decoration: underline;
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {
        position: relative;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: flex-start;
        
        > div {
            width: 50%;

            // &:first-of-type {
            //     position: -webkit-sticky;//for safari
            //     position: sticky;
            //     top: 0;
            // }
        }

        .details {
            padding: px-to-rem(32px) px-to-rem(76px) px-to-rem(48px) px-to-rem(48px);
        }

        .pdpForm {
            [type="submit"] {
                max-width: px-to-rem(405px);
            }
        }

        .facts {
            max-width: px-to-rem(405px);
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lg) {
        .details {
            padding-top: px-to-rem(60px);
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: px-to-rem(36px);
        }

        .blurb {
            font-size: px-to-rem(24px);
        }

        .sales-price {
            font-size: px-to-rem(36px);
        }

        .variations {
            a {
                font-size: px-to-rem(24px);
                padding-top: px-to-rem(8px);
                padding-bottom: px-to-rem(8px);
            }
        }

        .pdpForm {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            align-items: flex-end;

            > div {
                margin-right: 1rem;

                &:last-of-type {
                    flex-grow: 1;
                    margin-right: 0;
                }
            }

            input {
                width: 100%;
                min-width: px-to-rem(175px);
                max-width: none;
            }
        }

        .facts {
            text-align: right;
            padding: 0;
            width: auto;
            max-width: none;
        }
    }
}
